room_title: Escape room "Prison Heist" by Escape Games PDX in Portland
room_description: Before you can retire from your life of crime, you need to pay back the person who busted you out the first time. It’s the last heist of your criminal career and boy, it’s a big one. Do you have what it takes to evade the law, disarm security, and get the goods? If you’ve already played our original “Prison Break” room, don’t worry, this sequel features all new puzzles and storyline!
